alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Ochiltree; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 10:44PM CDT until August 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CARSON...HUTCHINSON...NORTHWESTERN GRAY... SOUTHEASTERN HANSFORD...WESTERN ROBERTS...SOUTHWESTERN OCHILTREE AND EAST CENTRAL MOORE COUNTIES... At 1044 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Stinnett, or 14 miles north of Borger, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Borger, Stinnett, Skellytown, Sanford, Morse and Pringle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Carson; Gray; Hansford; Hutchinson; Moore; Ochiltree; Roberts
